dnscodes.127.0.0.1: general spam, Sending spam to our spam traps.
dnscodes.127.0.0.2: Removal request made but missing required information, please make a new request and be sure to complete the form properly.
dnscodes.127.0.0.3: Does not follow valid can-spam rules for newsletters / lists.
dnscodes.127.0.0.4: Not RFC compliant, server errors or improper configuration.
dnscodes.127.0.0.5: Repeat offenders, these are IP's that have been removed and listed again (3) or more times in a short period of time.
dnscodes.127.0.0.6: Bouncing email to the wrong server, NON RFC compliant configurations.
dnscodes.127.0.0.7: Relay or Open relay with reports of spam.
dnscodes.127.0.0.8: bouncing spoofed emails, you need to disable bounce of spoofed emails in order to get de listed.
dnscodes.127.0.0.9: Fraud/Scam emails, malware or illegal/abusive content.
